snippet: Reliever David Robertson, who injured his right foot when he fell down a step, is not expected to miss significant time.
abstract: New York Yankees reliever David Robertson, who injured his right foot when he fell down a step, is not expected to miss significant time.
lead_paragraph: Reliever David Robertson, who injured his right foot when he fell down a step, is not expected to miss significant time.

headline.seo: Yankees’ Robertson, With Bone Bruise of Foot, Isn’t Expected to Miss Significant Time
